      • classifyTrain

        public static void classifyTrain(dataframe data,
                                 boolean use_smile)
                          throws FileNotFoundException
        Carries out training of logistic regression model using either smile package or self implemented logistic regression model using stochastic average gradient descent.
        Parameters:
        data - The dataframe that is used for training of the model.
        use_smile - The boolean value to indicate if smile package must be used.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if model.xml file is not found.

      • classifyTest

        public static int[] classifyTest(double[] data,
                                 boolean use_smile)
                          throws FileNotFoundException
        Carries out testing of logistic regression model using either smile package or self implemented logistic regression model using stochastic average gradient descent.
        Parameters:
        data - A 1D double array that is used for testing of the model.
        use_smile - The boolean value to indicate if smile package must be used.
        Returns:
        predictions as an integer array.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if model.xml file is not found.

      • smileLRTrain

        Parameters:
        data - The data that is used for training of the model.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if model.xml file is not found.
